Literature.Title: Mammalian cell toxicity and candidacidal mechanism of Arg- or Lys-containing Trp-rich model antimicrobial peptides and their d-enantiomeric peptides
Literature.Author: Shin SY, Kim HJ, Lee SH, Nan YH

Literature.Title: Cell specificity, anti-inflammatory activity, and plausible bactericidal mechanism of designed Trp-rich model antimicrobial peptides
Literature.Author: Park Y, Nan YH, Park KH, Shin SY, Hahm KS, Park IS, Kim JI

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans KCTC 7965(MIC=64µM),Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=8µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=2µM),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3068(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3001(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3543(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CCARM 2095(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CCARM 2109(MIC=16µM)
